text: The Michaels Companies, Inc. is an American company that is North America's largest provider of arts, crafts, framing, floral and wall d√©cor, and merchandise for makers and do-it-yourself home decorators. The company was founded by Michael J. Dupey in Dallas, Texas in 1973. ==References== Category:1970s establishments in Texas Category:1973 establishments in the United States Category:Retail markets Category:Companies based in Texas
